title: Profession of arms
creator_credit: Alex Ezard and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Life as a cadet at Duntroon - history and background. Shows National War Museum at Canberra and Duntroon - Australias only military college - established in 1911, as part of a defence plan recommended by Field Marshall Lord Kitchener. Royal Military College is an intensive four year course in academic and military training affiliated with the University of NSW.
